Verses: 1 ezhaam Varushaththile Yoidhaa Thidankondu, Nooruperukku Adhipadhigalaagiya Erogaamin Kumaaran Asariyaavaiyum, Yoganaanin Kumaaran Ismavelaiyum, Obedhin Kumaaran Asariyaavaiyum, Aadhaayaavin Kumaaran Maaseyaavaiyum, Sikriyin Kumaaran Elishaabaaththaiyum Than Udanpadikkaikku Utpaduththinaan.
2 avargal Yoodhaavile Sutriththirindhu, Yoodhaavin Pattanangalilellaam Irukkira Leviyaraiyum, Israveludaiya Pidhaakkalin Vamsaththalaivaraiyum Koottikkondu Erusalemukku Vandhaargal.

3 andha Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththil Raajaavode Udanpadikkai Seydhaargal; Yoidhaa Avargalai Nokki: Idho, Karththar Dhaaveedhin Kumaararaik Kuriththu Sonnapadiye Raajaavin Kumaaran Raajaavaaga Vendum.
4 neengal Seyyavendiya Kaariyamennavendraal, Ivvaaraththil, Muraippadi Varugira Aasaariyarum Leviyarumaana Ungalil Moondril Orupangu Olimugavaasalgalaiyum,
5 moondril Orupangu Raajaavin Aramanaiyaiyum, Moondril Orupangu Asthibaara Vaasalaiyum Kaakkavum, Janangalellaam Karththarudaiya Aalayap Praagaarangalil Irukkavum Vendum.

6 aasaariyarum Leviyaril Oozhiyamseygiravargalum Thavira, Oruvarum Karththarudaiya Aalayaththirkul Pravesikkavendaam; Avargale Utpravesippaargalaaga; Avargal Parisuththamaakkappattavargal; Janangalellaarum Karththarudaiya Kaavalaik Kaappaargalaaga.

7 leviyar Avaravar Thangal Aayudhangalaith Thangal Kaiyile Pidiththukkondavargalaai, Raajaavai Sutrilum Varisaiyaai Nindrukondirukkavendum; Aalayaththukkutpadugira Evanum Kolaiseyyappadakkadavan; Raajaa Utpravesikkirapodhum Veliye Purappadugirapodhum Neengal Avarode Irungal Endraan.

8 aasaariyanaagiya Yoidhaa Kattalaiyittapadiyellaam Leviyarum Yoodhaakoththiraththaar Anaivarum Seydhu, Avaravar Avvaaraththu Muraippadi Varugiravargalum, Muraitheerndhu Pogiravargalumaana Thamtham Manusharaik Koottikkonduponaargal; Vaguppugal Pirindhupoga Aasaariyanaagiya Yoidhaa Uththaravukodukkavillai.
9 dhaaveedhuraajaa Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththil Vaiththirundha Eettigalaiyum Kedagangalaiyum Parisaigalaiyum Aasaariyanaagiya Yoidhaa Nooruperukku Adhipadhiyinidaththil Koduththu,

10 avaravar Thangal Aayudhangalaik Kaiyile Pidiththukkondavargalaai Aalayaththin Valadhupakkanthodangi, Aalayaththin Idadhupakkamattum, Palipeedaththirkum Aalayaththirkum Edhire Raajaavai Sutrilum Nirka Janangalaiyellaam Niruththinaan.

11 pinbu Raajakumaaranai Veliye Konduvandhu, Kreedaththai Avanmel Vaiththu, Saatchiyin Aagamaththai Avan Kaiyile Koduththu, Avanai Raajaavaakkinaargal; Yoidhaavum Avan Kumaararum Avanai Abishegampanni, Raajaa Vaazhga Endraargal.
12 janangal Odivandhu, Raajaavaip Pugazhugira Saththaththai Aththaaliyaal Kettapodhu, Aval Karththarudaiya Aalayaththirku Janangalidaththil Vandhu,

13 idho, Nadaiyilulla Thannudaiya Thoonandaiyile Raajaa Nirkiradhaiyum, Raajaavandaiyil Nirkira Prabukkalaiyum, Ekkaalam Oodhugiravargalaiyum, Dhesaththu Janangalellaarum Sandhoshappattu Ekkaalangal Oodhugiradhaiyum, Keedhavaaththiyangalaip Pidiththukkondu Paadagarum Sangeedhaththalaivarum Thudhikkiradhaiyum Kandaal; Appozhudhu Aththaaliyaal Than Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkondu Dhrogam Dhrogam Endru Koovinaal.

14 aasaariyanaagiya Yoidhaa Raanuvaththalaivanaagiya Nooruperukku Adhipadhigalaanavargalai Veliye Azhaiththu, Avargalai Nokki: Ivalai Varisaikkuppurambe Kondupongal; Ivalaip Pinpatrugiravanaip Pattayaththaal Vettippodungal Endraan. Karththarin Aalayaththile Avalaik Kondrupodaadheyungal Endru Aasaariyan Solliyirundhaan.
15 avargal Avalukku Idamundaakkinapodhu, Aval Raajaavin Aramanaiyilirukkira Kudhiraigalin Vaasalukkul Pravesikkum Idamattum Ponaal; Ange Avalaik Kondrupottaargal.
16 appozhudhu Yoidhaa Thaangal Karththarudaiya Janamaayirukkumpadikku, Thaanum Sagala Janangalum Raajaavum Udanpadikkai Pannikkollumpadi Seydhaan.

17 appozhudhu Janangalellaarum Paagaalin Kovilukkup Poi, Adhai Idiththu, Adhin Palipeedangalaiyum, Adhin Vikkiragangalaiyum Thagarththu, Paagaalin Poosaasaariyaagiya Maaththaanaip Palipeedangalukku Munbaagak Kondrupottaargal.

18 dhaaveedhu Kattalaiyittapragaaram Sandhoshaththodum Sangeedhaththodum Karththarin Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalai Moseyin Nyaayappramaanaththil Ezhudhiyirukkirapadiye Seluththaththakkadhaaga, Yoidhaa Karththarudaiya Aalayaththai Visaarikkum Uththiyogangalai Dhaaveedhu Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkendru Paguththuvaiththa Leviyaraana Aasaariyargalin Kaiyil Oppuviththu,
19 yaadhoru Kaariyaththinaal Theettuppattavan Karththarudaiya Aalayaththirkul Pravesiyaadhapadikku, Adhin Vaasalgalukkuk Kaavalaalarai Niruththinaan.

20 nooruperukku Adhipadhigalaiyum, Periyavargalaiyum, Janaththai Aalugiravargalaiyum, Dhesaththu Samastha Janangalaiyum Koottikkondu, Raajaavaikkarththarudaiya Aalayaththilirundhu Irangappanni, Uyarndha Vaasalvazhiyaai Raaja Aramanaikkul Azhaiththuvandhu Arasaalum Singaasanaththinmel Raajaavai Utkaarappanninaargal.
21 dhesaththu Janangalellaarum Magizhndhaargal, Aththaaliyaalai Pattayaththaal Kondrapinbu Nagaram Amarikkaiyaayitru.
